sentences.en: His paintings have outstanding style of Matisse.
sentences.cn: 他的绘画具有明显的马蒂斯的绘画风格。

sentences.en: Matisse juxtaposes intense colors, varied patterns and a rhythmic line.
sentences.cn: 马蒂斯把强烈的色彩, 不同的图案和有节奏的线条放在一起.

sentences.en: Matisse used color andandback and forth until he felt he had achieved a balanced composition.
sentences.cn: 马蒂斯反复调试色彩、构思图案,终于画了一幅布局和谐的作品.

sentences.en: Once she was a nude model and muse to French artist Henri Matisse.
sentences.cn: 她曾是法国画家亨利·马蒂斯的人体模特和灵感女神。

sentences.en: SHARON: There is a Matisse at the Museum of Modern Art. Larry and I will go.
sentences.cn: 现代艺术博物馆现在展出法国画家马蒂斯的作品, 赖瑞和我想去看看.
这是一幅马蒂斯的作品.

sentences.en: Through out his long and successful career, Matisse sought to improve his work.
sentences.cn: 在他漫长而卓有成就的生涯中, 马蒂斯力图改进自己的作品.
